SQL.LOAD: SELECT credit_card_type_id, regular_expression_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, credit_card_format_id FROM elp_credit_card_format WHERE credit_card_format_id = :credit_card_format_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_CODE: select credit_card_format_id, CCF.credit_card_type_id, T.translation as Credit_Card_Type, CCF.regular_expression_id, re.format from ELITA.elp_credit_card_format CCF join elita.elp_regular_expression re on CCF.regular_expression_id = re.regular_expression_id join ELITA.elp_list_item I on CCF.credit_card_type_id = I.list_item_id and I.Code = :credit_card_type_code join ELITA.elp_dict_item_translation T on I.dict_item_id = T.dict_item_id join ELITA.elp_language L on T.language_id = L.language_id and L.language_id = :language_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select credit_card_format_id, CCF.credit_card_type_id, T.translation as Credit_Card_Type, CCF.regular_expression_id, re.format from ELITA.elp_credit_card_format CCF join elita.elp_regular_expression re on CCF.regular_expression_id = re.regular_expression_id join ELITA.elp_list_item I on CCF.credit_card_type_id = I.list_item_id join ELITA.elp_dict_item_translation T on I.dict_item_id = T.dict_item_id join ELITA.elp_language L on T.language_id = L.language_id and L.language_id = :language_id --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_credit_card_format SET credit_card_type_id = :credit_card_type_id, regular_expression_id = :regular_expression_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE credit_card_format_id = :credit_card_format_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_credit_card_format ( credit_card_type_id, regular_expression_id, created_by, credit_card_format_id ) VALUES ( :credit_card_type_id, :regular_expression_id, :created_by, :credit_card_format_id )
